channel.title: 317 PI Need help with jarring client
channel.description:
I am trying to jar my client so that's it a smaller and faster upload/download for players and for me. I jarred it following all the tut's ive found. I've used 4 different tuts trying to figure out why mine isn't working and haven't gotten anywhere. I have my signlink directed here: [QUOTE]C:/hybridpvpnetcache[/QUOTE]
And after i jarred it and signed it, but when I try to run the .jar or .bat, I get this error, and the screen freezes: [QUOTE]Generated by: JAR Maker ([url=http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/]Golden T Studios - Java Game Developer World[/url])
C:\Users\Dustin\Desktop>java -jar client.jar cache.zip 271 java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\hybridpvpnetcache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The syste m cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:146) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:101) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:76) at client.startUp(client.java:8457) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5752) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:215) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:145) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:116) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53) at Update.<init>(Update.java:29) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4467) at client.startUp(client.java:8467) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5752) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) [/QUOTE]
Please help?

item.title: 317 PI Need help with jarring client
item.dc:creator: @tdmister45 tdmister45
item.description:
@tdmister45 wrote:

My client is set to my java version lol…I have the run.bat and the compile.bat set all to it…where else do i find that?

Read full topic
item.source: 317 PI Need help with jarring client

item.title: 317 PI Need help with jarring client
item.dc:creator: @Ganstat Ganstat
item.description:
@Ganstat wrote:

That’s not an error. you just don’t have the path. that mean you need to set your client with your java version. and it should work.

Read full topic
item.source: 317 PI Need help with jarring client

item.title: 317 PI Need help with jarring client
item.dc:creator: @tdmister45 tdmister45
item.description:
@tdmister45 wrote:

I am trying to jar my client so that’s it a smaller and faster upload/download for players and for me. I jarred it following all the tut’s ive found. I’ve used 4 different tuts trying to figure out why mine isn’t working and haven’t gotten anywhere. I have my signlink directed here: [QUOTE]C:/hybridpvpnetcache[/QUOTE]

And after i jarred it and signed it, but when I try to run the .jar or .bat, I get this error, and the screen freezes: [QUOTE]Generated by: JAR Maker (Golden T Studios - Java Game Developer World)

C:\Users\Dustin\Desktop>java -jar client.jar
cache.zip 271
java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\hybridpvpnetcache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The syste
m cannot find the path specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(FileInputStream.java:146)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(FileInputStream.java:101)
at java.io.FileReader.(FileReader.java:58)
at client.setNewMaps(client.java:76)
at client.startUp(client.java:8457)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:5752)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:215)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:145)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:116)
at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53)
at Update.(Update.java:29)
at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4467)
at client.startUp(client.java:8467)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:5752)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
[/QUOTE]

Please help?
